p: HCoVs bind human cell receptors through the S1 domain of the S protein. The human receptor on the cell membranes for SARS-CoV, HCoV-NL63 and the newly discovered SARS-CoV2, is the angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) ( Hoffmann et al., 2020). MERS-CoV enters the cell using the cell adhesion molecule 1 (CEACAM1) or the dipeptidyl-peptidase 4 (DPP4) ( Wang et al., 2013).
